title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
summary: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai  (transl.â€‰Something happens) also known as KKHH, is a 1998 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy-drama written and directed by Karan Johar and produced under Dharma Productions. It stars the popular on-screen pair of Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol in their fourth film together along with Rani Mukerji, and Salman Khan. The plot combines two love triangles set years apart. The first half covers friends on a college campus, while the second tells the story of a widower's young daughter who tries to reunite her dad with his old best friend.
